##### FILE: mongo-controller.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicationController/mongo-controller:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mongo
  name: mongo-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          hostPort: 27017
          name: mongo
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - gcePersistentDisk:
          fsType: ext4
          pdName: mongo-disk
        name: mongo-persistent-storage

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/ReplicationController/mongo-controller failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/ReplicationController/mongo-controller failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

##### FILE: mongo-cron.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/mongo-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mongo-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - mongodump --uri mongodb://mongodb.goalapp.svc.cluster.local:27017 --out=~/backups/mongo-`date
              +%!F(MISSING)`
            image: mongo
            name: mongodump
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: ~/backups
              name: backups
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: backups
            persistentVolumeClaim:
              claimName: cron-pvc
  schedule: 10 20 * * *

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/CronJob/mongo-backup

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/CronJob/mongo-backup
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/CronJob/mongo-backup failed:
1 - autogen-cronjob-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-cronjob-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

##### FILE: mongo-cron1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/mongo-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mongo-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - mongodump --uri mongodb://mongodb.goalapp.svc.cluster.local:27017 --out=~/backups/mongo-`date
              +%!F(MISSING)`
            image: mongo
            name: mongodump
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: ~/backups
              name: backups
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: backups
            persistentVolumeClaim:
              claimName: cron-pvc
  schedule: 10 20 * * *

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: mongo-database.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---


Mutation:

          value: buse
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: "123456"
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/data/mongo
          name: mongodata
      volumes:
      - name: mongodata
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-claim

##### FILE: mongo-deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
    tier: production
  name: mongo
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
      tier: production
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
        tier: production
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --eval
            - 'db.runCommand({ ping: 1 })'
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-prod-pv
      nodeSelector:
        tier: production
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: tier
        operator: Equal
        value: production
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-prod-pv
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-mongo

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource production/Deployment/mongo

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource production/Deployment/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource production/Deployment/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

      app: mongo
      tier: production

            - --eval

          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi

        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-prod-pv

        tier: production

        operator: Equal

##### FILE: mongo-deploy2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: mongo-deploy
  name: mongo-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-deploy
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: mongo-deploy
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mongo-config
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
              name: mongo-config
        image: mongo:5.0.24
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources: {}
status: {}

---

##### FILE: mongo-deploy3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
      name: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongod
        - --bind_ip_all
        - --config=/etc/mongo/mongodb.conf
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-config
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:4.0.8
        name: mongocontainer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/mongo
          name: mongodb-config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: mongodb.conf
            path: mongodb.conf
          name: mongodb-config
        name: mongodb-config

---

##### FILE: mongo-deploy7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-storage
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: mongo-storage

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment-green:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
    env: green
  name: mongo-deployment-green
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
      env: green
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
        env: green
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: azuredisk-db
        - mountPath: /data/configdb
          name: azuredisk-configdb
      volumes:
      - name: azuredisk-db
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: azuredisk-db-pvc
      - name: azuredisk-configdb
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: azuredisk-configdb-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongo-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mongo
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_HOST
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-passwd
              name: mongo-initdb-root-password-file
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-initdb-username-file
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user-passwd
              name: mongo-initdb-password-file
        image: mongo:6.0.9-jammy
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data-container-volume-claim
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init-mongo.sh
          name: mongo-claim1
      restartPolicy: Always
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data-container-volume-claim
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-data-container-volume-claim
      - name: mongo-claim1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-claim1
status: {}

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: ns-todo
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongo-todo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

##### FILE: mongo-deployment14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-app
      name: mongo-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-config
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-config
        image: mongo
        name: mongo-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/mongo
          name: mongodb-config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: mongodb.conf
            path: mongodb.conf
          name: mongodb-config
        name: mongodb-config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mongo
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/kubernates-quarkus-example-project-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ghcr.io/woraamy/kubernates-quarkus-example-project/mongodb
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          hostPort: 27017
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mongo
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo

##### FILE: mongo-deployment18_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to pacman/ConfigMap/mongo-init-script:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  setup.sh: |
    #!/bin/bash
    set -e

    mongo -- "$MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE" <<EOF
        db.createUser({user: "pacman", pwd: "pacman", roles: [{role: "readWrite", db: "admin" }]});
        use pacman;
        db.createCollection("init");
        db.init.insert({name: "init"});
        db.init.find();
        db.createUser({user: "pacman", pwd: "pacman", roles: [{role: "readWrite", db: "pacman" }]});
    EOF
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mongo-init-script
  namespace: pacman

---

kind: Deployment

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:4.2.3
        name: mongo

          name: mongo

          name: mongo-data

          name: mongo-initdb

        name: mongo-data

          name: mongo-init-script
        name: mongo-initdb

##### FILE: mongo-deployment2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
      containers:
      - args:
        - |
          exec mongod --noauth --bind_ip_all
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        image: mongo:6
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 27017
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: storage
      volumes:
      - name: storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: librechat-mongodb-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongo-deployment27.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: C:\ProgramData\chocolatey\lib\kubernetes-kompose\tools\kompose.exe
      convert -f docker-compose.yml
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (765fde254)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mongo
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: C:\ProgramData\chocolatey\lib\kubernetes-kompose\tools\kompose.exe
          convert -f docker-compose.yml
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (765fde254)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/microservices-parent-updated-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:4.4.14-rc0-focal
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          hostPort: 27017
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-claim0
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init-mongo.js
          name: mongo-claim1
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-claim0
      - name: mongo-claim1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-claim1

---

kind: Deployment

  namespace: default

      - image: mongo:4.4.6

          name: mongodb-persistent-storage

      - name: mongodb-persistent-storage

##### FILE: mongo-deployment29.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongo-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: k8s-mongo
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:4.0-xenial
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: mongo-deployment34.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: to-do-app
    name: mongo-app-deployment
  name: mongo-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: to-do-app
      name: mongo-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: to-do-app
        name: mongo-pod
      name: mongo-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongo-deployment36.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    io.service: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.service: mongo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        io.network/backend: "true"
        io.service: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-storage
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-storage-pvc
status: {}

---

          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: adminpw
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          value: test
        image: lunadocker0198/mongodhackinti:1.0

        ports:

        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-storage

##### FILE: mongo-deployment39.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: backend
    app.kubernetes.io/name: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: backend
      app.kubernetes.io/name: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: backend
        app.kubernetes.io/name: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        image: mongo:4.2
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: my-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: my-secret
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongo-deployment5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mongo
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_HOST
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-passwd
              name: mongo-initdb-root-password-file
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-initdb-username-file
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user-passwd
              name: mongo-initdb-password-file
        image: mongo:6.0.9-jammy
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data-container-volume-claim
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init-mongo.sh
          name: mongo-claim1
      restartPolicy: Always
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data-container-volume-claim
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-data-container-volume-claim
      - name: mongo-claim1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-claim1
status: {}

---

##### FILE: mongo-deployment53.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (765fde254)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mongo
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (765fde254)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/chat-socket-challenge-main-angular-chat-net: "true"
        io.kompose.service: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: devpassword
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: devuser
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Bogota
        image: mongo:4.4
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - echo 'db.runCommand("ping").ok' | mongo mongo:27017/test --quiet
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          hostPort: 27017
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-claim0
      hostname: mongo
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-claim0

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: mongo-deployment54.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-storage
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: mongo-storage

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secrets
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secrets
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-payment-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-payment-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-payment-deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-payment-deployment
      name: mongo-payment-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: mongo-payment-configmap
        image: lucascandido/ms-mongodb-payment:latest
        name: mongo-payment-deployment
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/mongodb
          name: mongodb
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-payment-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongo-deployment6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
      containers:
      - args:
        - |
          exec mongod --noauth --bind_ip_all
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        image: mongo:6
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 27017
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: storage
      volumes:
      - name: storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: librechat-mongodb-pvc

---


Mutation:

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

---

        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:

##### FILE: mongo-deployment63.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - react-frontend
                - node-backend
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

##### FILE: mongo-deployment65.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mongo
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/final-project-1-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-data

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:

  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: example
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        resources: {}
status: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongo-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongo-deployment-ebs.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: my-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: my-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: my-ebs-pvc

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express

      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express:latest
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

##### FILE: mongo-express10.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        - name: ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: todoapp
        name: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          value: db-service
        image: mongo-express
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mymongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 80m
            memory: 250Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ENABLE_ADMIN
          value: "true"
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_AUTH_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_AUTH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

##### FILE: mongo-express24.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-db-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-db-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: db_url
              name: mongo-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

##### FILE: mongo-express31.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: mongo-express33.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-express-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: todoapp
        name: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          value: db-service
        image: mongo-express
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mymongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 80m
            memory: 250Mi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:

    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username

##### FILE: mongo-express44.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

##### FILE: mongo-express45.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: mongo-express49.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express:1.0.2-18-alpine3.18
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 256Mi

              name: mongodb-secret

          valueFrom:

##### FILE: mongo-express51.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        - name: ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-auth-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-auth-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_OPTIONS_EDITORTHEME
          value: panda-syntax
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

##### FILE: mongo-express6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_AUTH_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_AUTH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongo-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi

---

##### FILE: mongo-express68.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_USER
              name: karmadb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASS
              name: karmadb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: karmadb-config
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PORT
              name: karmadb-config
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_URL
          value: mongodb://$(ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME):$(ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD)@$(ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER):$(ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_PORT)/
        image: mongo-express:latest
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 256Mi

---


Mutation:

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

##### FILE: mongo-express7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongo-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

    app: mongo-express

  namespace: default

      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:

              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret

          valueFrom:

              name: mongodb-secret

          valueFrom:

          valueFrom:

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

##### FILE: mongo-express94.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

##### FILE: mongo-express-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-basic-auth-username
              name: mongo-express-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-basic-auth-password
              name: mongo-express-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongo-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

##### FILE: mongo-express-deployment10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          value: mongodb-0.mongodb-headless
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-url
              name: mongo-express-config
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-web
  name: mongo-web-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongo-url
              name: mongo-config
        image: mongo-express:latest
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
      name: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongo-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
      restartPolicy: Always

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: mongodb

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:

              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

##### FILE: mongo-express-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/mongo-express-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
  name: mongo-express-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: mongo-express.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: mongo-express-service
            port:
              number: 8081
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

  name: mongo-express-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: mongoexpress.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: mongodb-express-service
            port:
              number: 8081
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

  namespace: mongodb

  rules:

      - hostPath:
          path: /tmp/dbstore

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/mongo-init:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  job-init.js: |
    db = db.getSiblingDB('employee');
    db.createUser({
      user: 'employee_user',
      pwd: 'employee_password',
      roles:[
        {
          role: 'readWrite',
          db: 'employee'
        }
      ]
    });
    db.createCollection('employee');
    db.employee.insertMany(
      [
        {
          _id: 50882,
          name: 'Sashank',
          email: 'sashank1703@gmail.com',
          age: '32'
        },
        {
          _id: 50883,
          name: 'Aparna',
          email: 'aparna.samal7@gmail.com',
          age: '30'
        },
        {
          _id: 50884,
          name: 'Monalisa',
          email: 'monalisa.samantray11@gmail.com',
          age: '34'
        }
      ]
    );
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mongo-init
  namespace: default

##### FILE: mongo-k8s_2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongo-ms-statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGODB_URI
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongodb.uri
              name: mongo-config
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGODB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: mongo-namespace
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

apiVersion: v1

metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1

  name: network-policy-for-mongodb
  namespace: default

  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          role: node-backend
    ports:
    - port: 27017
      protocol: TCP
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      role: mongodb
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress

##### FILE: mongo-pod1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mongodb:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: mongo
    name: mongodb
    ports:
    - containerPort: 27017
      protocol: TCP
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data/db
      name: mongodb-data
  volumes:
  - name: mongodb-data
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/mongo-payment-storage:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: mongo-payment-storage
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 1Gi
  hostPath:
    path: /mnt/mongo
    type: DirectoryOrCreate
  storageClassName: mongo-payment-standard

---

##### FILE: mongo-replicated.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/mongo:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default

  clusterIP: None
  ports:
  - port: 27017
    targetPort: 27017
  selector:
    role: mongo

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 2, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: mongo-replicated_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: mongo
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongod
        - --replSet
        - rs0
        - --smallfiles
        - --noprealloc
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        image: mongo:4.0.8
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_SIDECAR_POD_LABELS
          value: role=mongo
        - name: KUBERNETES_MONGO_SERVICE_NAME
          value: mongo
        image: cvallance/mongo-k8s-sidecar
        name: mongo-sidecar
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 7Gi
      storageClassName: standard

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/


pass: 6, fail: 9, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 2

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: mongo
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongod
        - --replSet
        - rs0
        - --smallfiles
        - --noprealloc
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        image: mongo:4.0.8
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_SIDECAR_POD_LABELS
          value: role=mongo
        - name: KUBERNETES_MONGO_SERVICE_NAME
          value: mongo
        image: cvallance/mongo-k8s-sidecar
        name: mongo-sidecar
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 7Gi
      storageClassName: standard

##### FILE: mongo-reviews.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to library-ns/Deployment/mongo-reviews-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-reviews-deployment
  namespace: library-ns
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-reviews
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-reviews
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

##### FILE: mongo-reviews1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-reviews-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-reviews-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-reviews
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-reviews
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mongo-initdb
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mongo-reviews-initdb-config
        name: mongo-initdb

---

  mongo-user: echo -n mongouser | base64
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: mongo-secret
  namespace: default
type: Opaque

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: mongo-secret-deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-app
      name: mongo-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-config
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongo-container

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.
